title: Ask an Australian about government [Greek version]
creator_credit: Artransa Park Studios and Kay Roberts
brief_description: Describes the democratic government framework existing in Australia, covering its historical development, voting provisions, elections, and the respective Federal, State and Local government powers. Note: In Greek.
